login.title: proto instant messenger
login.subtitle: tattaunawar al'umma a kan AT Protocol
login.learnMore: Sabon zuwa atproto? Koyi ķarin bayani

banned.message: Ba a ba wannan asusu damar amfani da wannan sabis ba.

alphaGate.title: Alfa na Farko
alphaGate.body: proto instant messenger yana a mataki na alfa na farko yanzu. Abubuwa za su lalace kuma ana iya rasa bayanan tsakanin sabuntawa.
alphaGate.cta: Kana son samun damar shiga da wuri? Tuntuɓe mu a <blueskyLink>Bluesky</blueskyLink> ko <emailLink>imel</emailLink> kuma za mu shirya maka.

step.connectingToService: Ana haɗawa da proto instant messenger...

atprotoInfo.title: Mene ne atproto?

shortVersion.heading: A taƙaice
shortVersion.p1: AT Protocol (ko atproto) yarjejeniya ce don ƙirƙirar manhajojin zamantakewa mara tsari irin su proto instant messenger da sauransu da yawa. Maimakon kamfani ɗaya ya mallaki asusun ka, za ka zaɓi sabar (wanda ake kira Personal Data Server, ko PDS) don riƙe asalin ka da bayananka. Wannan asusu ɗaya yana aiki a kan kowane manhaja da aka gina a kan yarjejeniyar.
shortVersion.p2prefix: Idan kana zuwa daga kafofin watsa labarun na al'ada, wannan hanya ce ta daban gaba ɗaya.
shortVersion.p2suffix: yana bayyana yadda yake aiki da dalilin da ya sa yake da muhimmanci.

whyItMatters.heading: Me ya sa yake da muhimmanci

ownIdentity.text: Sunan ka da bayananka suna tafiya tare da kai — canza manhajoji ko sabar a kowane lokaci.

noLockIn.text: Manhajojin da aka gina a kan atproto na iya sadarwa da juna. Abokan ka na proto instant messenger su ne mutanen da kake bi a Bluesky.

openSource.text: Kowa zai iya gudanar da sabar ko gina manhaja. Babu masu tsare ķofa.

createAccount.heading: Buɗe asusu
createAccount.text: Don amfani da proto instant messenger, kana buƙatar asusu na atproto a kan kowane PDS. Wasu zaɓuɓɓuka:

atprotoInfo.disclaimer: proto instant messenger ba shi da alaƙa da kowane mai bayar da PDS. Mu ne aikin al'umma da ke ginawa a kan AT Protocol.
atprotoInfo.signInHint: Da zarar ka sami asusu, ka komo nan ka shiga da sunan ka (msl. sunanka.myatproto.social).

blacksky.name: blacksky.app
blacksky.description: PDS da al'umma ke gudanarwa wanda ke sa yarjejeniyar ta zama ta dimokuradiyya kuma ke gina wurare masu aminci. Da fatan za ka bi ɗokokin da ƙungiyar su suka kafa. Blacksky Algorithms ne ke gudanar da shi.
blacksky.warning: Wannan PDS an keɓe shi ne ga Baķaķen da ke gina ababen more rayuwar al'umma. Duk wani wanda ba haka ba da ya yi amfani da sunan blacksky.app zai sami gargaɗi sannan a dakatar da shi.

myatproto.name: myatproto.social da cryptoanarchy.network
myatproto.description: Blacksky Algorithms kuma yana gudanar da PDS waɗanda buɗaɗɗu ne ga kowa. Suna gudana ne a kan ababen more rayuwa iri ɗaya da blacksky.app kuma ƙungiya ɗaya ce ke kula da su.

transrights.name: transrights.northsky.social
transrights.description: Sarari na dijital da aka tsara don kulawa da amincin masu amfani ga al'ummomin 2SLGBTQIA+. Northsky Social Cooperative ne ke gudanar da shi.

bsky.name: bsky.social
bsky.description: Ƙungiyar Bluesky ne ke gudanar da shi.

fedbridgy.name: fed.brid.gy
fedbridgy.description: Yana haɗa asusun ka zuwa Fediverse (Mastodon, da sauransu).
